mapper.select: SELECT board_id , board_title , board_content , del_yn FROM board WHERE board_id = #{boardId}

SELECT a.board_id , a.board_title , a.board_content , a.frst_reg_dttm , nvl(d.nick, '탈퇴한 회원') AS writer , '#' || group_concat(c.tag_name separator '#') AS tags FROM board a LEFT OUTER JOIN board_tag_relation b ON a.board_id = b.board_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tags c ON b.tag_id = c.tag_id AND c.del_yn = false LEFT OUTER JOIN users d ON a.frst_reg_user_id = d.user_id WHERE a.del_yn = false GROUP BY a.board_id ORDER BY a.board_id DESC
